turns.content: I'm planning to buy some household essentials this weekend and I want to know what kind of discounts I can expect. By the way, I redeemed 500 points from my ShopSmart loyalty card last Saturday, which got me a nice $5 discount on my previous purchase.

That's great to hear that you redeemed your loyalty points and got a discount on your previous purchase!

As for your question, the type of discounts you can expect on household essentials can vary depending on the store, location, and current promotions. However, here are some common discounts you might find:

1. Sales: Many stores offer weekly sales on select household essentials, such as toilet paper, paper towels, cleaning supplies, and laundry detergent. You can expect discounts ranging from 10% to 50% off regular prices.
2. Buy One, Get One Free (BOGO): Some stores offer BOGO deals on household essentials, where you can get a second item of equal or lesser value for free.
3. Percentage-off discounts: Stores may offer a percentage-off discount on entire categories of household essentials, such as 20% off all cleaning supplies or 15% off all paper products.
4. Bundle deals: Purchasing multiple items together can sometimes result in a discounted price. For example, buying a bundle of laundry detergent and fabric softener might be cheaper than buying them individually.
5. Digital coupons: Many stores offer digital coupons that you can load onto your loyalty card or mobile app, providing additional discounts on household essentials.
6. Cashback offers: Some stores offer cashback rewards on certain household essentials, which can be redeemed on future purchases.
7. Clearance sections: Keep an eye out for clearance sections in stores, where you can find discounted prices on household essentials that are being discontinued or are near their expiration dates.

To maximize your savings, be sure to:

* Check the weekly ads and online promotions for your local stores to see what's on sale.
* Use your loyalty card or sign up for email newsletters to receive exclusive offers and discounts.
* Stack discounts by combining sales, digital coupons, and cashback offers.
* Consider shopping during off-peak seasons or using cashback apps to earn rewards on your purchases.

Happy shopping, and I hope you find some great deals on your household essentials!
